group_1.narration: Tsuruno is the strongest!
The strongest never wavers no matter what happens!
Whatever happens, Tsuruno's mission will not change!
I'll defeat a whole lot of Witches and@protect everyone at Mikazuki Villa!
...Sure, I was just the self-proclaimed strongest,@but even I never thought it'd be proven wrong.
It all started at the Memory Museum.
It was a lecture on "The Truth about Magical Girls"@by Touka Satomi, from the Wings of the Magius.
The truths came one after another, and were spoken so lightly...@But each one was heavy, and hard to accept.
After the classroom lecture, there was hands-on learning@using the power of a [textBlue:Rumor].
The stage we entered was the "former Mikazuki Villa"―@A place I had once belonged to.
All those happy, joyful days were right@on the edge of collapsing.
As time flowed on, the events from a certain day@were projected next...
It was the day when the happy days of@Mikazuki Villa came to an end.
That fateful day which became the reason I decided to@protect everything on my own.
It just so happened that Banbanzai was extra busy that day.@I couldn't join them in the fight, and...
It was here at the Museum that I finally saw for the@first time how Mel had died that day.
No, no, it can't be...@Back then, Mel became a Witch...!
That was different from the story I'd heard...@and I realized right away that Yachiyo had been lying.
Mel didn't just die,
she became a Witch!
That was the truth about Magical Girls that I learned.
A Magical Girl becomes a Witch.
Even just that truth was already shocking to me, but...
...What filled me with even deeper despair was the@appearance of the Witch we saw projected.
The Witch born from Mel's Soul Gem―
It was the very same Witch as one I had once defeated...
"I'm the mightiest Magical Girl@and I'll defeat any Witch!"
I said that kind of thing before, but...
Looks like I've really made a serious mistake.
Mel, I'm so sorry.
